title: 50 series
flavorText: Fifty series completed. You are the endgame content. The System offers you a throne made of bookmarks.
trigger: Finish 50 complete series.

title: The Chronicler
flavorText: A thousand hours of listening. The System would give you a medal, but it spent the budget on traps.
trigger: Reach 1,000 hours of total listening time.

title: Century Club
flavorText: One hundred books finished. At this point the System isn't rewarding you. It's documenting you.
trigger: Finish 100 books total.

title: 25 series
flavorText: Twenty-five series. You've crushed more arcs than most editors. The System fears your momentum.
trigger: Finish 25 complete series.

title: Deep Diver
flavorText: Five hundred hours. You've been listening long enough to develop plot-based instincts.
trigger: Reach 500 hours of total listening time.

title: Gold Scholar
flavorText: Fifty books. Your brain is now 12% audiobook and 88% opinions. The System approves. Reluctantly.
trigger: Finish 50 books total.

title: Series Master
flavorText: Ten series completed. You don't finish stories. You hunt them.
trigger: Finish 10 complete series.

title: Backlog Resident
flavorText: At this point you should pay rent.
trigger: Finish 50 books by the same author

title: Franchise Loyalist
flavorText: At this point, you're their unpaid marketing team.
trigger: Finish 5 complete series by the same author

title: Catching Up
flavorText: You completed a series with more than ten books. The System calls this 'endurance.' Your friends call it 'a cry for help.'
trigger: Finish a series with more than 10 books.

title: Bibliophile
flavorText: Ten books by the same author. At this point you're funding their coffee habit personally.
trigger: Finish 10 books by the same author.

title: The Epic
flavorText: You finished a book longer than 50 hours. The System has no reward worthy of this. It offers trauma instead.
trigger: Finish a book that is over 50 hours long.

title: Silver Scholar
flavorText: Twenty-five completions. That's not 'a phase.' That's a lifestyle choice.
trigger: Finish 25 books total.

title: Serial Listener
flavorText: Five series completed. The System is updating your title to: 'Problematic.'
trigger: Finish 5 complete series.

title: Narrator Junkie
flavorText: Ten books by the same narrator. You don't listen to books. You listen to a person.
trigger: finish 10 books by the same narrator

title: Main Character Syndrome
flavorText: You don't read authors. You live in their backlog.
trigger: Finish 20 books by the same author

title: Franchise Devotee
flavorText: You don't follow authors. You pledge allegiance.
trigger: Finish 3 complete series by the same author

title: Extreme Binger
flavorText: Sleep is optional. The story is not.
trigger: Any single listening session lasts at least 10 hours

title: Marathon Month
flavorText: One hundred hours in a single month. You didn't have a life that month. You had a playlist.
trigger: Listen 100 hours in a single month

title: Century Club
flavorText: One hundred books in a single year. That's not reading. That's a competitive sport.
trigger: Finish 100 books in a single calendar year

title: The Completionist
flavorText: Fifty achievements unlocked. You didn't just play the game. You beat it. The System has nothing left to teach you.
trigger: Earn 50 other achievements

title: Monthly Grind
flavorText: Twenty days in a month. Consistency beats motivation.
trigger: Listen on 20 distinct days in a single month

title: Committed
flavorText: One hundred hours listened. That's a part-time job you volunteered for.
trigger: Reach 100 hours of total listening time.

title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
flavorText: You saved the world because of a cat. A talking, magical cat. Princess Donut accepts your awkward leadership. The System just accepts your survival.
trigger: Complete all books in Dungeon Crawler Carl

title: Weekend Marathon
flavorText: Weekends are for rest. You chose story.
trigger: Listen for at least 10 hours over a single weekend

title: Superfan
flavorText: Five books by the same author. You're not obsessed. You're 'consistent.'
trigger: Finish 5 books by the same author.

title: The Long Haul
flavorText: You finished a book longer than 30 hours. That wasn't a book. That was a hostage situation.
trigger: Finish a book that is over 30 hours long.

title: The Decade
flavorText: Ten books. You've formed a habit. The System suggests you stop pretending otherwise.
trigger: Finish 10 books total.

title: Eclectic Reader
flavorText: You refuse to read the same voice twice.
trigger: Finish books by 10 different authors

title: Page Turner
flavorText: You started it. You finished it. You slept later.
trigger: Finish a book in a single day

title: Speed Reader
flavorText: A 20-hour book in under a week. The System clocked you doing 3x the speed limit.
trigger: Finish a book that is 20+ hours long in under 7 days

title: Daily Listener
flavorText: Seven days straight. The story owns your schedule now.
trigger: Listen on 7 consecutive days

title: Iron Streak
flavorText: Thirty days straight. At this point the audiobook is raising you.
trigger: Listen on 30 consecutive days

title: Completionist Junior
flavorText: Three books. One arc. Zero restraint. The System awards you a small victory and a bigger temptation.
trigger: Finish a trilogy.

title: Binge Listener
flavorText: Just one more chapter turned into half your day.
trigger: Any single listening session lasts at least 5 hours

title: Five-Pack
flavorText: Five books down. You're not addicted. You're 'committed.' That's what the addicts say.
trigger: Finish 5 books total.

title: 1 series
flavorText: You finished an entire series. The System marks it 'cleared' and immediately offers you three more.
trigger: Finish 1 complete series.

title: Side Quest
flavorText: You completed a series with exactly two books. The System respects efficient obsession.
trigger: Finish a series with exactly 2 books.

title: Pointy Hat Approved
flavorText: Magic detected. Hat optional.
trigger: Finish a book with mage OR wizard OR sorcerer in the title

title: Author Collector
flavorText: Five authors. Five voices. Infinite backlog.
trigger: Finish books by 5 different authors

title: Habit Forming
flavorText: Three days in a row. The routine has begun.
trigger: Listen on 3 consecutive days

title: Multi-talented
flavorText: The author narrated their own book. Bold. Intimate. Slightly unhinged.
trigger: Finish a book that is narrated by the author.

title: 2:00 AM: Poor Life Choices
flavorText: You listened past 2 AM on a weeknight. Tomorrow-you is furious. The System is delighted.
trigger: User has any listening session that reaches = 2:00 AM America/New_York, where the local day is Monday - Friday.

title: Early Bird
flavorText: Listening before 6 AM. The sun isn't even up yet but your TBR doesn't care.
trigger: User has any listening session starting before 6:00 AM America/New_York

title: Novella Collector
flavorText: Five short books down. You're basically speedrunning literature.
trigger: Finish 5 books that are under 5 hours long.

title: Short & Sweet
flavorText: You finished a book under 3 hours. Quick. Clean. Suspiciously efficient.
trigger: Finish a book that is under 3 hours long.

title: 20 books
flavorText: Twenty books finished. You now have opinions on narrators you've never met. The System approves of your confidence.
trigger: Finish 20 audiobooks total.

title: First Word
flavorText: You finished your first audiobook. The System is proud. Don't get used to it.
trigger: Finish 1 audiobook.

title: 15 series
flavorText: Fifteen series. That's not dedication. That's a condition. The System recommends sunlight.
trigger: Finish 15 complete series.

title: 2 series
flavorText: Two series down. You're officially the kind of person who says, 'I'll just start the next one.' The System smiles.
trigger: Finish 2 complete series.

title: 20 series
flavorText: Twenty series finished. You've lived multiple lifetimes and still have backlog. The System nods knowingly.
trigger: Finish 20 complete series.

title: Series Starter
flavorText: Five different series started. You are one bad decision away from 40 unfinished arcs.
trigger: Finish the first book of 5 different series.

title: Voice of Reason
flavorText: Five books with the same narrator. That voice lives in your head now. Rent-free.
trigger: finish 5 books by the same narrator

title: Mutual Book Trauma
flavorText: You have at least one completed book in common with every other user. Congratulations. You've built a library-shaped social graph.
trigger: For user U, for every other user V: completed(U) n completed(V) ? Ø

title: Shared Experience
flavorText: Two minds. One book. Same week. The System suspects a book club.
trigger: Two users finish the same book within the same week

title: Dragon Rider
flavorText: You finished a book with 'Dragon' in the title. The System rates your survival odds as 'funny.'
trigger: Finish a book with 'Dragon' in the title.

title: Interstellar
achievement: In Space, Nobody Can Hear You Binge
flavorText: You finished a book with 'Space,' 'Galaxy,' or 'Star' in the title. The vacuum of space has nothing on your attention span.
trigger: Finish a book with 'Space,' 'Galaxy,' or 'Star' in the title.
